title: TJA Speed Changer - Modify TJA files and audio source speed
description: Modify TJA files and audio source speed for Taiko no Tatsufin
drag_drop_hint: Drag and drop TJA file here or click Browse

warning_no_wave: Warning: WAVE tag not found in TJA file, only processing score file

about_text:
TJA Speed Changer GUI v1.0

A tool for modifying TJA files and audio source speed for Taiko no Tatsujin.

Features:
• Modify TJA file parameters (BPM, OFFSET, etc.)
• Process audio files with FFmpeg
• Support for multiple languages
• Drag and drop file selection
help_text:
How to use:

1. Select a TJA file by browsing or drag & drop
2. Adjust the speed multiplier (0.5 - 2.0)
3. Choose your preferred language
4. Click 'Process Files' to start

The tool will automatically:
• Create a new TJA file with modified parameters
• Process the associated audio file if found
• Adjust timing parameters accordingly

Note: FFmpeg is required for audio processing.
